headerText: The `v-breadcrumbs` component is a navigational helper for pages. It can accept a **Material Icons** icon or text characters as a divider. An array of objects can be passed to the **items** property of the component.  Additionally, a scoped slot exists for more control of the breadcrumbs, either utilizing `v-breadcrumbs-item` or other custom markup.

usage.desc: By default, breadcrumbs use a text divider. This can be any string.

iconDividers.desc: For the icon variant, breadcrumbs can use any icon in Material Design Icons.

itemSlot.desc: You can use the scoped `item` slot to customize each breadcrumb.

props.icons: Specifies that the dividers are icons
props.items: An array of objects describing each breadcrumb. See `v-breadcrumbs-item` API section for all object properties. Use `text` property for the breadcrumb text.
props.justifyEnd: Align the breadcrumbs at the end
props.large: Increase the font-size of the breadcrumb item text

scopedSlots.item: Scoped slot for overriding default breadcrumb item rendering
